function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Relying on incomplete symptom screening for covid-19","Lack of effective contact tracing","Inaccurate tools for contact tracing and social distancing","Clinical staff using pulse oximeters can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized between uses","Potential spread of contagious diseases through the use of shared wearable devices and smart technology in educational settings","Security breach risk in wearable devices","Inaccuracy in early detection of covid-19 using wearable technology","Potential spread of covid-19 from real-life subjects involved in wearable technology experiments","Potential inaccuracies in early detection of covid-19 using wearable technology","Potential transmission of contagious diseases through shared article downloads and access to online library resources","Vulnerability of multiple sectors to the impacts of contagious diseases","Lack of focus on health in the built environment","Rapid development in the sectors of construction and the built environment","Potential for transmission of contagious diseases among construction sector participants","Increase in off-site construction may lead to a higher risk of contagious diseases transmission","Increased use of digital techniques and technologies in construction may facilitate the spread of misinformation and fake news related to contagious diseases","Rapid shelter construction and emergency constructions may lead to overcrowding and inadequate ventilation, increasing the risk of airborne contagious diseases transmission","Impact of high population density on the spread of covid-19"]}
